name: Culture Warz: Time's Up Karen!
description:
In a world not too dissimilar from ours, social media has rotted minds of the masses turning them into zombies driven by a primal urge to be the most insufferable versions of themselves whilst feasting on brains of the rest of humanity.

Who will defeat these social stereotypes? It can only be Chad.

-Blast through waves of zombies desperate to take down Chad, use your arsenal of weapons to kill the zombies. Watch out as the horde will increase as you progress.
-Fight meme zombies with their own unique abilities, including Karen herself.
-Keep an eye out for Golden Boss zombies, they have more health and are much harder to kill
-Navigate through a randomly generated map using the environment to your advantage.
-Grab pickups the zombies drop to gain the upper hand.

Based on user feedback, we will be making some more of the content free, like some weapons, power-ups and gamemodes
